eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api
Interface AdvanceXMLCommunicator

All Known Implementing Classes:
HttpCommunicator, TestHttpCommunicator
public interface AdvanceXMLCommunicator

Base interface for classes that communicate via XML based messages.

Author:
akarnokd, 2011.10.03.

Method Summary

          Query for a (default) response without sending a query message.

          Receive XML responses continuously.

void send(eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.xml.XElement request)
          throws java.io.IOException
Send a request that doesn't return a response (other than acknowledgement).

Throws:

receive

hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Observable<eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.xml.XElement> receive(eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.xml.XElement request,
                                                                                                 hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler scheduler)
Receive XML responses continuously. The returned data should be a complete XML, but its parsing is done per each of the root's children, e.g., an XML of <a><b/><b/></a> will produce two b elements. Observers should throw a CancellationException to stop the reception

Parameters:
request - the request to send the response messages or exceptions
scheduler - where the blocking wait occurs
Returns:
the closeable to terminate the streaming
Throws:
java.io.IOException
